title: Designing Customized Science Education for Adult Learners Based on a Digital Field Experience Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in digital tools and intermediate-level expertise in scientific disciplines
context.additional_context: Learner role: Administrator/Leader, Assessment method: Formative assessment-centered, Technology environment: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device)

learning_goals: Learners can explain the three core elements of the Digital Field Experience (DFE) model: digital delivery, real-time field experience, and adult learner-tailored design.
Learners can design and demonstrate one DFE content applicable to their professional field.
Learners can apply teaching methods that enhance adult learner engagement using real-time video conferencing tools and digital collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
